name: TrendMicroHomeNetworkSecurity
0:
”Alexa, open Trend Micro.”
”Alexa, ask Trend Micro if my network is OK.”
”Alexa, ask Trend Micro to scan my network.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trend micro
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Trend Micro Home Network Security is smart protection for your connected devices at home. Now you can use the Trend Micro Home Network Security skill to scan your network, stay up-to-date with your security status and pause the internet for your children. 

Get started by enabling the Trend Micro Home Network Security skill in the Alexa app and linking your Trend Micro and Alexa accounts.

Once the skill has been enabled, you can ask Alexa to control Home Network Security.

Start a Check Devices Scan - To check your network and devices, you say: 
"Alexa, tell Trend Micro to scan my network."

Get Your Security Status - To get a network security status update, you can say: 
"Alexa, ask Trend Micro if my network is ok."

Get An Online Activity Summary - To get a summary of a profile's online activity, you can say:
"Alexa, ask Trend Micro what Tom did today."

Pause the Internet for a Profile - To disconnect the devices assigned to a profile from the internet, you simply say:
"Alexa, ask Trend Micro to pause the Internet for Tom."

Pause YouTube for a Profile - To prevent the devices assigned to a profile from accessing YouTube, you simply say:
"Alexa, ask Trend Micro to turn off YouTube for Tom."
